net: tun: call napi_schedule_prep() to ensure we own a napi

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.9 by commit 999550c8cbb3fcb535f542d652fe1cb936839e5f, it was introduced in version v6.0.9 by commit 8b12a020b20a78f62bedc50f26db3bf4fadf8cb9. For more details please see the references link.
